basics.name: Glenn A. Batuyong
basics.label: Technologist, videographer, web designer
basics.summary: As a content creator I have solid experience in videography (camerawork and post-production), as well as web content writing, publishing, and graphics production. My work has earned one Emmy nomination, two Telly Awards, four San Diego Press Club awards, and recognition as a Webby Official Honoree. I always keep a finger on the pulse of new media, inbound marketing, and communications trends. Creating an exceptional user experience and advocating for universal access to information —these are just a few things I care about and heavily influence my daily work. I serve as a subject matter expert on online social collaboration services, blogging and content management platforms, and web-technology integration, with experience in installation, workflow, and production.

work.summary: Focused on dynamic digital signage design and content, internal photography and videography, media production, email marketing, web technical consultation
highlights: Digital signage: Created branded five-day weather forecast displays with HTML5/CSS3 for HD/4K displays, dynamic data via AngularJS https://github.com/47ronin/forecastview
Digital signage: Created brand screens with corporate investor data and single day weather conditions, responsive HTML5/CSS3 for HD/4K/8K displays, background video, dynamic data via AngularJS
